feed.title: Little Grand Rapids - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Little Grand Rapids
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 20 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
